promptPrefix:
Imagine you are a marketing professional tasked with creating a Google ad campaign for [PROMPT]. Your first step is to identify the target audience for this product. Think about the demographics, interests, and behaviors of the ideal customer for this product. Consider factors such as age, gender, location, income, education, and purchasing habits. What keywords and phrases would your target audience be searching for? What kind of messaging and imagery would resonate with them? Brainstorm a list of potential target audience segments and their corresponding ad campaigns.

Your first task is to create a Google ad campaign targeting the identified audience. The target language is [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: 1 Click Google Ads Target Audience
